And then there's the utter stupidity of the requests. Do you really think someone's sitting on 'The Dark Knight Rises' and is just waiting for someone to say they want it? If it's a new movie, and it's a blockbuster, it's absolutely going to be uploaded here the first moment that's possible. To think it's all depending on you asking is just exceedingly stupid.

The Maynard ghost is considered the most violent in European history
Mrs. Maynard still lives in the house
Sally still does not dare go into her former bedroom
THIS FILM IS DEDICATED TO IRENE HOLDEN
